title: Tri-Series in Sri Lanka 2018 Scoreboard
text: March 12, 2018 / 6:17 PM / Updated 2 hours ago Tri-Series in Sri Lanka 2018 Scoreboard Reuters Staff 3 Min Read Mar 12 (OPTA) - Scoreboard at close of play of match 4 between Sri Lanka and India on Monday at Colombo, Sri Lanka India win by 6 wickets Sri Lanka 1st innings Danushka Gunathilaka c Suresh Raina b Shardul Thakur 17 Kusal Mendis c Rohit Sharma b Yuzvendra Chahal 55 Kusal Perera b Washington Sundar 3 Upul Tharanga b Vijay Shankar 22 Thisara Perera c Yuzvendra Chahal b Shardul Thakur 15 Jeevan Mendis b Washington Sundar 1 Dasun Shanaka c Dinesh Karthik b Shardul Thakur 19 Akila Dananjaya c Lokesh Rahul b Jaydev Unadkat 5 Suranga Lakmal Not Out 5 Dushmantha Chameera c Jaydev Unadkat b Shardul Thakur 0 Extras 0b 1lb 1nb 0pen 8w 10 Total (19.0 overs) 152-9 Fall of Wickets : 1-25 Gunathilaka, 2-34 Perera, 3-96 Tharanga, 4-113 Perera, 5-118 Mendis, 6-120 Mendis, 7-146 Perera, 8-151 Shanaka, 9-151 Chameera Did Not Bat : Fernando Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Jaydev Unadkat 3 0 33 1 11.00 1w Washington Sundar 4 0 21 2 5.25 Shardul Thakur 4 0 27 4 6.75 1w Yuzvendra Chahal 4 0 34 1 8.50 2w 1nb Vijay Shankar 3 0 30 1 10.00 1w Suresh Raina 1 0 6 0 6.00 1w India 1st innings Rohit Sharma c Kusal Mendis b Akila Dananjaya 11 Shikhar Dhawan c Thisara Perera b Akila Dananjaya 8 Lokesh Rahul Hit Wicket b Jeevan Mendis 18 Suresh Raina c Thisara Perera b Nuwan Pradeep 27 Manish Pandey Not Out 42 Dinesh Karthik Not Out 39 Extras 0b 1lb 0nb 0pen 7w 8 Total (17.3 overs) 153-4 Fall of Wickets : 1-13 Sharma, 2-22 Dhawan, 3-62 Raina, 4-85 Rahul Did Not Bat : Sundar, Shankar, Unadkat, Chahal, Thakur Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Suranga Lakmal 2 0 19 0 9.50 Akila Dananjaya 4 0 19 2 4.75 2w Dushmantha Chameera 3 0 33 0 11.00 1w Nuwan Pradeep 2.3 0 30 1 12.00 Jeevan Mendis 4 0 34 1 8.50 1w Thisara Perera 2 0 17 0 8.50 Umpire Ranmore Martinesz Umpire Lyndon Hannibal Video Raja Wimalasiri Match Referee Brian Broad
